entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Severn
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:24 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 28.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 36.
